channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: windows下hugo快速构建博客
item.description: windows 安装运行 https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases 下载 windows-64bit.zip cd e: mkdri hugo cd hugo mkdir bin 解压缩到e:\hugo\bin hugo version hugo new site myblog cd myblog https://themes.gohugo.io git clone https://github.com/vaga/hugo-theme-m10c.git themes/m10c cd themes cd .. hugo server -t m10c –buildDrafts http://localhost:1313/ hugo new post/blog.md cd content cd post 用vscode 来写 blog.md cd myblog hugo server -t m10c –buildDrafts 修改 title 部署到github create a new repository Owner frzw Repository name frzw.
